saldin samuel wrote:

> I am getting the following error on using HtmlUnit. I
> tried searching for a solution but I couldnt. It would
> be great if you could provide me an "how-to" to solve
> this issue.

I'm shocked that you couldn't find an answer on the web.

WebClient.setRedirectEnabled() is the method you want--or at least it's 
very close to the method you want.

Good luck.
